thread.title: Ground News - FDA would like to stop finding Viagra in supplements sold on Amazon
thread.title_full: Ground News - FDA would like to stop finding Viagra in supplements sold on Amazon

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - FDA would like to stop finding Viagra in supplements sold on Amazon
text:
Summary by Ground News The FDA has issued a warning letter to Amazon over mislabelled prescription drugs. Amazon is being given 15 days to respond to the warning letter. The FDA found seven products for sale on Amazon that contained either Sildenafil or Tadalafil. The drugs inhibit an enzyme called a type-5 phosphodiesterase which influences the circulatory system.
